title: test_case
description: A test case JSON object as returned by the API

version.description: The version number of this JSON schema

_id.description: The ID associated with this test case as provided by the database

name.description: The name given to this test case

created_on.description: Creation date of this test case in the database

test_set_id.description: The test set ID associated with this test case

test_suite_id.description: The test suite ID associated with this test case

parameters.description: Free form object to store key-value pairs describing the parameters used to run the test

status.description: The status of the execution of this test case

time.description: The number of seconds it took to execute this test case

definition_uri.description: The URI where this test case definition is stored

vcs_commit.description: The VCS commit value if the $uri field is a VCS URI

metadata.description: Free form object where accessory test case data is stored

measurements.description: Array of measurement objects registered by this test case

attachments.description: List of attachment objects produced by this test case
